# arrangedSubviews

**Instance Property**

The array of views that the split view arranges as its split panes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var arrangedSubviews: [NSView] { get }
```

## Discussion

This array contains a subset of the views in the split view’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/subviews] property. The views in this array may appear in a different order than in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/subviews] array.

If the value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSplitView/arrangesAllSubviews] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this array is identical to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/subviews] array.

## Arranging Subviews

- **arrangesAllSubviews**: A Boolean value that determines whether the split view arranges all of its subviews as split panes.
- **addArrangedSubview(_:)**: Adds a view as an arranged split pane.
- **insertArrangedSubview(_:at:)**: Adds a view as an arranged split pane at the specified index.
- **removeArrangedSubview(_:)**: Removes a view as an arranged split pane.
